decodeAndGetFinalizedSTKState(Asset stor.details: Decode and load the finalized STKState of the asset

decodeAndGetSTKState(Asset storage).details: Decode and load the STKState of the asset

encodeAndSetFinalizedSTKState(Asset stor.details: Tightly pack and store finalized STKState

encodeAndSetSTKTerms(Asset storage,STKTe.details: Tightly pack and store only non-zero overwritten terms (LifecycleTerms)

encodeAndSetSTKTerms(Asset storage,STKTe.notice: All non zero values of the overwrittenTerms object are stored. It does not check if overwrittenAttributesMap actually marks attribute as overwritten.
